function.name: music_stop
function.description: This function is used to stop playing music on a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to stop playing music.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to stop playing music.

appname.description: The app name to stop playing music.

predefinedAppName.description: The predefined app name to stop playing music.

title.description: The title to stop playing music.

cast.description: The cast to stop playing music.
